name: goofily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mainly US in a way that is silly or funny: The character she plays is likable and goofily charming. He is a goofily enthusiastic, but totally ungraceful, dancer.
with a smile that is big, funny, or silly: The child's smile is made goofily endearing by two missing front teeth. I couldn't stop myself from grinning goofily.
More examplesFewer examplesHe has a goofily surreal world view.Their goofily infectious sense of humour is intact.They didn't know what to do, but grinned goofily.Mostly he smiles goofily.
